Artworks.Name: Kh-59 Cruise Missiles
Artworks.Description: Kh-59 cruise missiles. Variants presented: Kh-59M - TV guided Kh-59MK - Radar guided Kh-59MK2 - Land attack variant 3D Models done in Blender and textures done in Substance Painter. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: BrahMos Ramjet Supersonic Cruise Missile

Images.Description: Front Cap Removed. Ram Intake visible

Artworks.Description: BrahMos Ramjet Supersonic Cruise Missile. Can be launched from Submarine, Warship, Aircraft or Land. It is one of the fastest supersonic cruise missiles in the world. Textures done in Substance Painter. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. 3D Model was provided by Community member A_Tactical_Catto. His link: https://mdjahinhossain.artstation.com/ Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Su-30SM UFC
Artworks.Description: UFC (Up Front Controller) module for Sukhoi Su-30SM Aircraft. Textures done in Substance Painter. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. 3D Model was provided by team member Freebird. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: SURA HMD for Su-30
Artworks.Description: SURA Helmet mounted aiming system. Can be mounted on ZSh-7 or later versions of Russian helmets. Textures done in Substance Painter. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. 3D Model was provided by team member Neoshot. His link: https://neoshot.artstation.com/ Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: MSA Gallet LA100 Helmet
Artworks.Description: MSA Gallet LA100 helmet for Sukhoi Su-30 MKM(Malaysian variant). 3D Models done in Blender and textures done in Substance Painter. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. 3D Model was provided by team member Neoshot. His link: https://neoshot.artstation.com/ Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Zvezda K-36DM Ejection Seat
Artworks.Description: The Zvezda K-36 is a series of ejection seats made by NPP Zvezda. Variants of this ejection seat have been used on a variety of aircraft, including the Su-25, Su-27, MiG-29, Su-30 MKI and the Su-57. The specific version presented here is the DM-II version mainly used in Sukhoi Su-30. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Kh-38 Air to Surface Missiles
Artworks.Description: Kh-38 Family of Air to surface missiles. 3D Models done in Blender and textures done in Substance Painter. Variants presented: Kh-38 MAE - Inertial + Active Radar AGM Kh-38 MLE - Inertial + Semi-Active Laser AGM Kh-38 MTE - Inertial + IR AGM Kh-36 - Tactical Cruise Missile This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Zvezda Kh-35 Cruise Missile

Images.Description: Kh-35UE Wings folded and intake cap removed

Artworks.Description: Zvezda Kh-35 turbojet subsonic cruise anti-ship missile. 3D Models done in Blender and textures done in Substance Painter. Variants presented are: 35E and 35UE. UE is a more modern extended range variant. Launch platforms include Su-30, MiG-29K, Su-35 etc This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Kh-31 Air to Surface Missiles
Artworks.Description: Kh-31 air-to-surface missiles. 3D Models done in Blender and textures done in Substance Painter. Variants presented are: A,P,AD,PD. A is for antishipping or against other surface targets. P is Antiradiation variant intended for SEAD. AD and PD are extended range variants respectively. Launch platforms include Su-30, MiG-29K, Su-35 This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Fuel Probe for Su-30
Artworks.Description: Sukhoi Su-30 is capable of in-flight refueling thanks to its retractable fuel probe. This 3D Model was done in Blender and textures were done in Substance Painter. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Vympel Kh-29 Air to Surface Missiles
Artworks.Description: Sukhoi Su-30 is capable of in-flight refueling thanks to its retractable fuel probe. This 3D Model was done in Blender and textures were done in Substance Painter. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Saturn AL-31F Engine Nozzle
Artworks.Description: Saturn AL-31F Engine Nozzle textures done in Substance Painter. Powerplant for Sukhoi Su-30 incorporates two Saturn AL-31F afterburning low-bypass turbofan engines, fed through intake ramps. This model is the Nozzle for the engine. This is a game asset intended for DCS:World Community Su-30 Mod. 3D Model was provided by team member Neoshot. His link: https://neoshot.artstation.com/ Mod Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Saturn AL-31F Engine Exterior
Artworks.Description: Saturn AL-31F Engine exterior textures done in Substance Painter. Powerplant for Sukhoi Su-30 incorporates two Saturn AL-31F afterburning low-bypass turbofan engines, fed through intake ramps. This model is the exterior shell for the engine. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. 3D Model was provided by team member Neoshot. His link: https://neoshot.artstation.com/ Mod Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Flight Sticks for Su-30
Artworks.Description: Flight Control Sticks for Sukhoi Su-30. Texturing was done in Substance Painter. This is a game asset intended for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. 3D Model was provided by team member Neoshot. His link: https://neoshot.artstation.com/ Mod Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Su-35S Cockpit Topology
Artworks.Description: 3D Topology showcase for some of the key segments of Su-35 Flanker-E cockpit. 3D model and topology renders were done in Blender 2.92. These game assets are part of the cockpit of Sukhoi 35S multirole fighter as observed in real life. This is intended to be used in DCS World Community Su-35S Mod. For project details, visit our discord: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Su-35S Cockpit 3D Assembly
Artworks.Description: 3D Assembly showcase for Su-35 Flanker-E cockpit. 3D model was created in Blender 2.92 and Renders were created in I-Ray inside Substance Painter 2020. This model has not been unwrapped for this showcase and the baked maps may highlight some artifacts. This is a collection of game assets put together to represent the cockpit of Sukhoi 35S multirole fighter as observed in real life. This is intended to be used in DCS World Community Su-35S Mod. For project details, visit our discord: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: Su-35S Cockpit Textures
Artworks.Description: Texture showcase for Su-35 Flanker-E cockpit inside DCS:World. 3D model was created in Blender 2.92 and Textures were made in Substance Painter 2021. Screenshots for this showcase were taken in game in real time. I used UDIM workflow this time and also, every single asset was manually unwrapped and distributed in 15 texture sets. PBR RoughMet workflow was used. This is a collection of game assets put together to represent the cockpit of Sukhoi 35S multirole fighter as observed in real life. This is intended to be used in DCS World Community Su-35S Mod. For project details, visit our discord: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75

Artworks.Name: R-77
Artworks.Description: 3D model of Russian air-to-air missile R-77. This model have been created for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75 Model have one material and one texture 2048x2048. Model characteristics: Polygons: 5641 Triangles: 12494

Artworks.Name: FAB-500 M-62NV <Bearoar>
Artworks.Description: This is first fiction weapon in my weapon pack based on FAB-500 M-62 and Mk-82 Snakeye. I was inspired by Mk-82 umbrella brake and wanted to make something similar in Soviet bombs. This model animated and have LODS. Triangles count: Base model: 12752 LOD_0 (~82% polygons): 10816 LOD_1 (~65% polygons): 8442 LOD_2 (~47% polygons): 5894 LOD_3 (~30% polygons): 3242 Model have one material and texture 2048x2048. Base model and LODS are skinned by bones (bones control deployable umbrella system of bomb). This model have been created for DCS World Community Su-30 Mod. Project details: https://discord.gg/sbw8A5Mg75
